content:
#13811 is a pretty substantial adaptation PR, bringing us up to 2024-06-12.

This includes adaptations for:

  • https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/4430
  • https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/4421
  • https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/4357
  • https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/4385
  • https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/4408

Sorry that it's a few days worth in one go, for various reasons it was hard to get to green during this period.

Unfortunately not much of this is backportable (I already made a little in mathlib#13707), so I think this just needs to be reviewed in one go.

We'll having more breaking changes coming soon. :-)
:ping_pong:
@Kim Morrison Left one mini comment. :peace_sign:
